title: gift card problems
body:
i can't redeem my gift card? 
it says
"We apologize, but our store was unable to process your payment at this time.  Please wait a few minutes and try again. If you've received this message multiple times, please contact us at https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

i've bought the gift card in Spain i don't know if it makes any difference but how do i redeem it then?!

replies.body: Did you purchase a prepaid RP card or is this a different method of payment?
